text: The term virtual cloud is used to describe a worldwide network of interconnected servers, which function as a single ecosystem that provides the possibility of storing information directly, or progressively perform data storage processes. The cloud is a virtual space that provides portability, since it is possible to access its content from anywhere and at any time. There are several applications that work with this technology and provide its service.
